/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. On the right side of the street, there's a yellow building with a red roof, adding a pop of color to the scene. The sun is shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the textures of the trees and building. The image captures the essence of a sunny day in Beijing, with its blend of urban architecture and natural elements.
